contest-event.event-date:
June 1, 1903 D Llandovery Contest
Llandovery Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Llandovery Contest llandovery-contest
Gems of Welsh Melody
Llandovery, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £1. March contest - 1st Protheroe's, 2nd joint between Tycroes and Trebanos. 5 bands competed.
June 12, 2013, 7:38 p.m. July 27, 2018, 8:01 a.m.
1 Protheroe's Silver A. T. Harris
2 Tycroes Silver D. Williams
3 Trebanos Public Thomas Hanney
4 Loughor Silver Sam Bleddyn Dennis
5 Ystradgynlais Public Band Henry Williams
